org.ndnx.ndn.config
Class UserConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.ndnx.ndn.config.UserConfiguration

public class UserConfiguration
extends Object

A class encapsulating user-specific configuration information and default variable values. Eventually this will be handled more sensibly by a user configuration file. This is likely to change extensively as the user model evolves.

NDNX_USER_NAMESPACE_PREFIX_PROPERTY

protected static final String NDNX_USER_NAMESPACE_PREFIX_PROPERTY
User namespace, by default ndnxNamespace()//userName(); the user namespace prefix will be set to the value given here -- so the user namespace will be userNamespacePrefix()// for either a user name we are given or our default user name.

NDNX_DEFAULT_KEY_LOCATOR_PROPERTY

protected static final String NDNX_DEFAULT_KEY_LOCATOR_PROPERTY
Property and variable to set the key locator to use for the default key. Need something more complicated, probably read from a configuration file. But this will get us started. Parse this as "key locator for the default key", not "the default value for the key locator".

See Also:

NDNX_PUBLISH_KEYS_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE

protected static final String NDNX_PUBLISH_KEYS_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE
See Also:
Constant Field Values

NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY

protected static final String NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY
Property and variable to control whether we load/can set user's key-related configuration (key locators, key cache, etc). Key cache saving and loading is additionally handled below -- both this variable and that one need to be set to true to automatically save and load the key cache; if NDNX_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY is true but this NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY is false, then users can manually save and load the key cache, but it will not be handled automatically on startup.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE

protected static final String NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE
See Also:
Constant Field Values

NDNX_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_PROPERTY

protected static final String NDNX_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_PROPERTY
Variable to control whether key cache is saved on request and reloaded on startup. See NDNX_USE_KEY_CONFIGURATION_PROPERTY.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NDNX_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE

protected static final String NDNX_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE

DEFAULT_SAVE_KEY_CACHE_SETTING

Constant Field Values

_userConfigurationDir

protected static String _userConfigurationDir
Value of NDN directory.

_userName

protected static String _userName
User name. By default value of user.name property.

_defaultNamespace

protected static ContentName _defaultNamespace
NDNx (control) prefix.

_userNamespace

protected static ContentName _userNamespace
User prefix (e.g. for keys). By default, the user namespace prefix together with user information.

_userNamespacePrefix

protected static ContentName _userNamespacePrefix
User namespace prefix (e.g. for keys). By default, the NDNX prefix

_keystoreFileName

protected static String _keystoreFileName
Keystore file name. This is the name of the actual file, without the directory.

_keystorePassword

protected static String _keystorePassword
Keystore password, if not default. Yes we know this is bad; it's on our list of things to improve.

_configurationFileName

protected static String _configurationFileName
Configuration file name. This is the name of the actual file, without the directory.

_publishKeys

protected static Boolean _publishKeys
Do we publish keys by default?

_useKeyConfiguration

protected static Boolean _useKeyConfiguration
Do we load stored state about cached secret keys, key locators (credentials) to use, and so on? Setting this to false can prevent interactions between unit tests and the user's internal configuration data. If false, we also prevent writing to configuration state.

_saveAndLoadKeyCache

protected static Boolean _saveAndLoadKeyCache
Do we automatically save and load the key cache as part of the configuration data? (Automatic loading of key cache happens only if _useKeyConfiguration is also true.)

USER_DIR

protected static final String USER_DIR

public static String defaultKeyLocator()
Don't provide a mechanism to set this here; this is actually configured on the KeyManagers. Just provide a means for them to pull in property/environment/configuration file parameters.
